description:
A DAW built using Electron and the Web Audio API


Added
- We are now catching and logging unhandled errors and rejected promises!
Changed
- The Application menu in the menubar will now show DAWG on Windows and Linux (this was done automatically on MacOS).
Fix
- Extension loading now working on Windows.
  Previously a path issue caused some extensions to not be loaded.
- Fixed menubar and context menus in Windows.
  Previously small discrepancies in the behavior of these items between operating systems prevented them from functioning properly.
